meta.title: T4 Capital
meta.description: Specializing in digital assets and tech equities, T4 Capital develops investment strategies to help investors capitalize on the rapid advancements in blockchain, AI, and other transformative technologies.

strategies.title: Our Altcoin Strategies
strategies.headline: We identify opportunities at the intersection of Blockchain and AI

about.title: ABOUT US
about.content: Founded in 2021, <Logo></Logo> Capital builds innovative investment strategies across the digital asset landscape.
about.founders: We represent the four T's. As tech enthusiasts who met at the University of St. Gallen, we are on a mission to boost portfolios with active tech exposure.
